examples: She delivered a speech at the address.
The package was returned because of an incorrect address.
Qual é o seu endereço de e-mail?
Ela fez um discurso no endereço.
O pacote foi devolvido devido a um endereço incorreto.

suggested: Why was the envelope mad? Because it was addressed to the wrong person!
A lost address book can feel like losing a piece of your past.
Why do I have to fill out my address on every single form? It's so frustrating!
Did you know that in some countries, addresses are written starting with the smallest unit (such as apartment number) and then the largest (such as street name)?
The smell of a freshly printed envelope with a new address label.
The feeling of satisfaction when finally finding the correct address.
An address can represent a place of belonging, a connection to a community, or a symbol of home.
